actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1296.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968, as amended, to authorize additional appropriations, and for other purposes.
short_title: Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Amendments

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Amendments - Authorizes the appropriation of $2,000,000 for fiscal year 1975 and $2,850,000 for fiscal year 1976 to carry out the provisions of the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968, with the exception of Federal grants-in-aid authorized under the Act. Authorizes the appropriation of $1,800,000 for fiscal year 1975 and $2,500,000 for fiscal year 1976 for Federal grants-in-aid under the Act.

titles.title: Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968, as amended, to authorize additional appropriations, and for other purposes.
